# <a name="import-contacts"></a><span data-ttu-id="7ec01-102">Uvoz kontakata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-102">Import contacts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7ec01-103">Pre uvoza kontakata u Outlook na Webu, moraćete da ih izvezete iz vašeg e-mail dobavljača kao .csv datoteku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-103">Before importing contacts to Outlook on the web, you'll need to export them from your other email provider as a .csv file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7ec01-104">Zatim sledite uputstva ispod.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-104">Then, follow the instructions below.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7ec01-105">U donjem delu stranice, izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-105">At the bottom of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="7ec01-106">**Ljudi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-106">**People**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="7ec01-107">Na traci sa alatkama izaberite stavku **Upravljanje** > **Uvezi kontakte**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-107">On the toolbar, select **Manage** > **Import contacts**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="7ec01-108">Izaberite **Potraži**, odaberite CSV datoteku, a zatim izaberite **Otvori**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-108">Select **Browse**, choose your CSV file, and then select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="7ec01-109">Izaberite **Uvoz**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-109">Select **Import**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7ec01-110">Da biste saznali više, pogledajte [Uvoz kontakata u Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/bb796340-b58a-46c1-90c7-b549b8f3c5f8#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ec01-110">To learn more, see [Import contacts to Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/bb796340-b58a-46c1-90c7-b549b8f3c5f8#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web).</span></span>
